![edit?usp=docslist_api](https://docs.google.com/file/d/0B0nBEdIhAv3GZ2ZQTEdnTmFySDg/edit?usp=docslist_api)![edit?usp=docslist_api](https://docs.google.com/file/d/0B0nBEdIhAv3GdTZkZG9GMjFrdVk/edit?usp=docslist_api)![edit?usp=docslist_api](https://docs.google.com/file/d/0B0nBEdIhAv3GY1FUWXlQb19EZW8/edit?usp=docslist_api)A simple yet elegant design. Used short range to taxi kerbals using the abort system to land along with the landing legs. Use infinifuel to go long range and keep it under 1/3 throttle.

Download and pictures (download will be up at roughly 5:00)

[https://drive.google.com/drive/u/0/mobile?rfd=1#folder/0B0nBEdIhAv3GflVtQ2dNMkJUbkFOZHZWbUFtY1V2dnhYQm0zT19pdEs1TFlMRUZheGhNbDQ?sort=13&direction=a](https://drive.google.com/drive/u/0/mobile?rfd=1#folder/0B0nBEdIhAv3GflVtQ2dNMkJUbkFOZHZWbUFtY1V2dnhYQm0zT19pdEs1TFlMRUZheGhNbDQ?sort=13&direction=a)
